text:
Flavio Cotti (18 October 1939 – 16 December 2020) was a Swiss politician. He was born in Prato-Sornico, Switzerland.
He was elected to the Federal Council of Switzerland on 10 December 1986. He retired on 30 April 1999. He was a member of the Christian Democratic People's Party of Switzerland.
He was President of the Confederation twice, first in 1991 and then again in 1998.
Cotti died on 16 December 2020 of COVID-19 in Locarno, Switzerland at the age of 81.
